Abstract class Job

Constructors

run(ProgressMonitor monitor): Future<Job>
toString(): String

A long-running task.

Fields

final String name

Constructors

Job(String name)

Methods

Future<Job> run(ProgressMonitor monitor)

Run this job. The job can optionally provide progress through the given progress monitor. When it finishes, it should complete the Future that is returned.

String toString()

Returns a string representation of this object.

Class JobManager

Fields
isJobRunning: bool
onChange: Stream
Getters and Setters
isJobRunning: bool
onChange: Stream<JobManagerEvent>
Constructors
JobManager()
Methods
schedule(Job job): void

A Job manager. This class can be used to schedule jobs, and provides event notification for job progress.

This class is available as a singleton on the workbench.

final bool isJobRunning
final Stream onChange
